title: Actively "Retry" to Launch Game Client -- Livestreaming for Exposure
body:
I will be streaming this bullshit.      https://www.twitch.tv/itsxaufi



The failure to launch is about 95%.





The Hextech Repair Tool is pinging Google's servers in Mountain View California.
Changing my DNS has not fixed this issue.
Removing the Wireless functionality from my router has not fixed it.
Closing all antivirus, antimalware, or firewall does not have any effect.

I've been keeping a log in Notepad for every game that I play since yesterday since I am continually being punished by Leaverbuster. These are automated and are most certainly false positives. I can not leave a game that I was never connected to in the first place.. like come on.

Here are my results from the last 2 days so far..

Elapsed Time between Champion Select and entering a match over the last 5 matches has been has been 51 minutes of repeated attempts to launch the client.


A = TIME OF INITIAL LAUNCH AFTER CHAMPION SELECT
B = TIME OF SUCCESSFUL LAUNCH OF GAME CLIENT
E = ELAPSED TIME (IN MINUTES)
C = IN-GAME TIME OF ENTRY


FRI 7/7/2017

1 ]

AI | MASTER YI | JUNGLE | 55ms
A 12:58 PM
B 01:10 PM
E 12 MINUTES
C 10:45 --> 22:17 77cs

2 ]

AI | MASTER YI | JUNGLE | 55ms
A 01:25 PM
B 01:43 PM
E 18 MINUTES
C 16:12 -- > 20:10 25cs

Leaverbuster 5 min Low Priority Queue

3 ]

AI | XIN XHAO | JUNGLE | 55ms
A 01:56 PM
B 01:57 PM
E 1 MINUTE
C 00:00 - 25:15 189cs

Leaverbuster 5 min Low Priority Queue

SAT 

1 ]

AI | ASHE | ADC | 55ms
A 06:13 PM
B 06:14 PM
E 1 MIN
C 00:00 - 21:38 147 cs

Leaverbuster 5 min Low Priority Queue

2 ]

AI | MASTER YI | JUNGLE | 55ms
A 08:00 PM
B 08:21 PM
E 21 MINUTES
C 19:02 - 26:23 62cs

3 ]  I am currently on Twitch streaming this.. I hope a Rioter sees this and does something .. I have put in a ticket with the support team and it has been removed or deleted as I can no longer access it.

replies.body:
If you're having that much trouble getting a solid connection to our servers there might actually be something running on your pc that's giving your network such a hard time. I'd suggest doing a quick [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to make sure nothing interferes with League while it's running.

I also looked into your ticket, and it doesn't look like anythings been deleted. Even once tickets are solved, they remain in our system for reference. I do see your current ticket with our tech team, so if that clean boot doesn't help continue working with them and you'll have a smoother time connecting soon.

The only thing that has changed was the 7.13 patch. Everything else, all programs and all settings have remained the same.

I'm really to that point that I wish you guys at Riot had the resources to provide Live Tech Support. This back and forth once every day or two is absurdly slow.

I'd still recommend going through those steps and trying the clean boot. Even though you haven't manually changed anything, it doesn't mean something could still be interfering with your connection. Essentially, we still need to go through the usual troubleshooting steps in order to rule out certain possibilities.

Another 25 Minute Penalty... 5 minute Low Priority Queue for 5 matches.

Awarded a punishment again. Gj Riot.
